txt.en: 'Brilliant! You dance like a true dwarf. I am sincerely impressed. Please take this knowledge of our dance-style and show others what incredible things you can do! I am proud to call you friend!'
Dances with Dwarves
The dwarf-dance has begun
'The dance will begin soon! Make sure you have me targeted when I begin to call out the dance-moves.'

The Dance Leader is in the tavern at Thorin's Hall.\n\nWait for the dwarf dance-celebration to begin and follow the instructions of the Dance Leader.

Follow the dance steps called out by the Dance Leader.

It is festival time! A time of dance and celebration. Come dance with the dwarves and learn their steps.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Follow the dance steps called out by the Dance Leader.
The Dance Leader is in the tavern at Thorin's Hall.\n\nHaving completed the dance-steps required, speak to the Dance Leader to learn the dance of the dwarves.

'Welcome to the festival, friend. I see that you would like to participate in the dancing and rejoicing that happens when the festival comes to the Mountains. I too, would love to dance in joyous merriment. \n\n'Every twenty minutes, I will lead a dance in celebration of the festival. I would love for you to come join me when the time has come!'
